metadata.title: RLProfilePicturesREVAMP - Custom Rocket League Avatars
metadata.description: RLProfilePicturesREVAMP lets Epic Games users set custom profile pictures in Rocket League and view cross-platform avatars. Easy install, configurable, and free.
metadata.ogDescription: Upload a custom Epic avatar and see Steam/console avatars in Rocket League with Bakkesmod.
metadata.twitterDescription: Upload a custom Epic avatar and see Steam/console avatars in Rocket League with Bakkesmod.

hero.title: Custom Profile Pictures
hero.subtitle: for Rocket League
hero.descriptionBig: Epic Games users can't set profile pictures in Rocket League - until now!
hero.description: RLProfilePicturesREVAMP lets Epic users upload custom avatars that other plugin users can see. Plus, view Steam, PSN, Xbox, and Switch avatars from all players - everything configurable in your settings!

features.title: üöÄ Key Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for the perfect Rocket League avatar experience

customAvatar.title: Custom Epic Avatars
customAvatar.description: Upload your own profile picture as an Epic Games user
customAvatar.details: Finally, Epic Games users can have custom profile pictures in Rocket League

crossPlatform.title: Cross-Platform Viewing
crossPlatform.description: See Steam, PSN, Xbox, and Switch profile pictures
crossPlatform.details: View avatars from all platforms that Epic users normally can't see

configurable.title: Fully Configurable
configurable.description: Brightness control, visibility settings, and more
configurable.details: Customize every aspect of how avatars appear in your game

autoUpdates.title: Auto-Updates
autoUpdates.details: Automatic updates ensure you always have the latest features

howItWorks.title: üîß How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Our advanced system seamlessly integrates with Rocket League to provide the ultimate avatar experience across all platforms.

step1.title: Upload Your Avatar
step1.description: Use the plugin menu to set your custom profile picture.

step2.title: Secure CDN Storage
step2.description: Your image is stored on our dedicated server infrastructure.

step3.title: Instant Visibility
step3.description: Other plugin users automatically see your custom avatar in-game.

step4.title: Cross-Platform Magic
step4.description: View Steam/console avatars that Epic users normally can't see.

card1.title: üöÄ Instant Setup
card1.description: Get started in under 2 minutes with our automated installer. No technical knowledge required.

card2.title: ‚ö° High Performance
card2.description: The optimized code ensures zero impact on game performance while providing perfect avatar integration.

screenshots.subtitle: Discover how RLProfilePicturesREVAMP transforms your Rocket League experience with stunning visual examples and real gameplay footage.

installation.title: ‚ö° Installation Guide
installation.subtitle: Get up and running in under 2 minutes with our streamlined installation process. Choose between automatic or manual installation methods.

securityNote.title: Security Note
securityNote.description: Windows Defender may flag the installer as unsafe. This is a false positive because it modifies Bakkesmod files. Run as Administrator or exclude from antivirus.

steps.moveDlls: Move both `.dll` files into the plugins folder

steps.console: Open Bakkesmod console (`F6`) and type `plugin list`
steps.checkPlugins: Look for `rlprofilepicturesrevamp` and `rlpfpmanager` in the list
steps.accessMenu: In-game, press `F2` ‚Üí Plugins ‚Üí `RLProfilePicturesREVAMP` to access settings
steps.upload: Upload your avatar and configure your preferences

troubleshooting.title: Need Help?
troubleshooting.description: Join our Discord server for real-time support from the community and developers.

faq.title: ‚ùì Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find quick answers to common questions about installation, usage, and troubleshooting. Can't find what you're looking for? Join our Discord for personalized support.

uploadProfilePicture.question: How do I upload my profile picture?
uploadProfilePicture.answer: After installation, press `F2` in-game ‚Üí Plugins ‚Üí `RLProfilePicturesREVAMP`. Click "Upload Avatar" and select your image file. Make sure it meets the size/format requirements (PNG, 48x48px recommended).

otherPlayersSeeAvatar.question: Can other players see my avatar if they don't have the plugin?
otherPlayersSeeAvatar.answer: No, only players who have RLProfilePicturesREVAMP installed can see custom Epic avatars. However, you can still see Steam/console avatars even if other Epic players can't.

avatarNotShowing.question: My avatar isn't showing up or looks too dark/bright
avatarNotShowing.answer: Try adjusting the brightness setting in the plugin menu. If it's still not working, ensure your image meets the format requirements and try re-uploading.

errorRemoveDll.question: Error: "Failed to remove old dll, access denied"
errorRemoveDll.answer: Make sure Rocket League is completely closed before updating. If the issue persists, restart your PC and run the installer as Administrator.

beforeBugReport.question: Before opening a bug report, what should I try?
beforeBugReport.answer: Try these steps first: 1) Reinstall the plugin completely, 2) Update with the latest zip file, 3) Check that both DLL files are in the plugins folder, 4) Verify your internet connection

errorMissingFiles.question: Error: "Missing files when running the installer"
errorMissingFiles.answer: This happens if you start the installer directly from inside the ZIP file. Please right-click the ZIP ‚Üí "Extract All‚Ä¶", then run the installer from the extracted folder. The installer needs all files in the same folder to work.

shareLogs.question: How do I share my Bakkesmod logs for support?
shareLogs.answer: Press `WIN+R` ‚Üí type `%appdata%/bakkesmod/bakkesmod`, look for `bakkesmod.log`. ‚ö†Ô∏è Share privately with support via Discord DM (not publicly in channels) for security reasons.

windowsDefenderUnsafe.question: Windows Defender says the installer is unsafe?
windowsDefenderUnsafe.answer: This is a false positive because the installer modifies files inside Bakkesmod. You can either exclude it in your antivirus or run the installer as Administrator. The software is completely safe.

questions.pleaseWatchTutorial: Please watch our tutorial for more details
